what is happening at the refuge...besides some people camping in the cold? People take guns on public land all the time when they're camping... Are you saying the bad words have caused you injury? The study isn't just about social media. It's about listening to music, watching TV, playing video games, and using social media. You can't complain about social media and then turn around and let your kid watch TV for 4 hours a night or play video games until it's bed time. None of this stuff is bad in moderation. My daughter plays Minecraft, listens to music, reads books, plays outside, and watches TV on top of being active in karate and now swimming. Before you knock on the habits of teens, take a look at yourself. My newsfeed is constantly full of people saying they binged watched 2 seasons of some show on Netflix.

They're humans not robots. Look Ava finally eats tomatoes. Nia eats fruits and veggies. They both love salads. Eating doesn't have to be stressful. It's a time where family gathers and messes can be made. We're not dining at a Royal dinner.
